content: on the needles and knit them pick up and knit 2sts from gap starting to work in the round again round 2-3 knit all sts round 4 k19 k2tog round 5 k2 p3 to end rounds 6-9 repeat round 5 bind off all sts left mitten cuff co 64sts and repeat everything you did for the right mitten from round 1 to 53 but this time use pattern for left mitten instead thumb gusset round 54 p1 k7 four times m1p p1 m1p work row 2 of left mitten pattern to end omitting the first purl st on the first repeat you just made a purl st didn t you the pattern should align perfectly round 55 p1 k7 four times p1 place first marker k1 place second marker work in pattern to end round 56 p1 k7 four times p1 slm k1 slm work in pattern to end round 57 p1 k7 four times p1 slm m1l k1 m1r slm work in pattern to end round 58 p1 k7 four times p1 slm k3 slm work in pattern to end round 59 repeat round 58 round 60 p1 k7 four times p1 slm k1 m1l k to one st before second marker m1r k1 slm work in pattern to end round 61 p1 k7 four times p1 slm k to second marker slm work in pattern to end round 62 repeat round 61 repeat rounds 60-62 until there are 17sts between markers palm round 81 p1 k7 four times slip the next 19sts on a stitch holder or piece of waste yarn pulling out markers on the way co 1st using the backwards loop method work in pattern to end omitting the first purl st on the first repeat round 82 p1 k7 four times work in pattern to end repeat round 82 until your have completed 8 full repeats of left mitten pattern on the back of the hand in total just count the repeats from ribbing to where your needles are repeat round 82 once more working row 1 of left mitten pattern repeat round 1 for 11 round bind off all sts work thumb as described for right mitten finishing weave in all ends and make sure to close any gaps on the inside of the thumbs wash and block lightly if desired put on a coat your favorite hat and your new mittens go outside and play in the woods if you have any questions concerning the pattern please contact me info with2hands@web de or drop me a message on ravelry
